snippet: During a conference call, Eli Manning talks about being the host of "Saturday Night Live"--and about the the penalties given to Saints players for the team's bounty program.
abstract: During a conference call, Eli Manning talks about being the host of "Saturday Night Live"--and about the the penalties given to Saints players for the team's bounty program.

headline.main: Live from New York, Eli Manning Talks About the Saints' Bounty Program
